settings.loading_delay_text: Miserable users will be subjected to a page loading delay of a random period between the two values provided here.
settings.broken_page_chance_text: You may present miserable users with a broken page from time to time. Enter the percentage chance of this happening.
settings.flood_time_multiplier_text: The standard minimum time (which is 10 seconds) between messages can be multiplied to make miserable users wait longer between posting.
settings.redirection_chance_text: Enter the percentage chance that a miserable user will be redirected to the redirection page URL.
settings.redirection_page_url_text: You may randomly redirect miserable users to a different page. Leave this blank to redirect to the forum home page.
settings.log_out_chance_text: Enter the percentage chance that a miserable user will be logged out and redirected back to the home page. Remember! Once logged out, they're not miserable anymore.
settings.shuffle_post_chance_text: You may randomly shuffle a miserable user's post. Enter the percentage chance of this happening.
